amendment.description: An amendment numbered 70 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit the use of funds for EPA to take backstop actions related to the Chesapeake Bay TMDL.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds for the Environmental Protection Agency to take backstop actions related to the Chesapeake Bay Total Maximum Daily Load.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 243 (Roll no. 573).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 243 (Roll no. 573).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
